Interior.name: Royal Touch
Interior.description: Royal Touch Interior Emulsion is a luxury high-sheen finish paint, formulated with 100% pure acrylic for excellent stain and scrub resistance. It provides a smooth, even flow when applied by roller, thanks to its advanced rheology additives. The paint offers superb hiding and coverage, delivering a flawless finish with fewer coats.

Interior.name: Intouch
Interior.description: Intouch Emulsion is a 100% pure acrylic-based paint that delivers a smooth, shiny finish. The formula provides excellent washability, color retention, hiding, and coverage, ensuring your walls stay fresh and vibrant for longer.

Interior.name: Aura
Interior.description: Aura is a modified acrylic-based interior emulsion that provides a uniform, even finish. The paint film is washable, offering good hiding, coverage, and a smooth, matt texture with a slight sheen for a sophisticated look.

Exterior.name: Champion
Exterior.description: Champion Exterior Emulsion is a super-premium anti-algae paint designed to withstand harsh weather conditions. Its advanced formula ensures excellent UV protection, dirt pick-up resistance, and superior durability, maintaining the beauty of exteriors with minimal maintenance.

Exterior.name: Proshine
Exterior.description: ProShine Exterior Emulsion is a premium-quality paint designed for decorative and protective exterior finishes. It offers good coverage, effective weather and fungal resistance, and excellent protection against algae and alkali, making it ideal for long-lasting performance.

Exterior.name: Wondershield
Exterior.description: Wondershield Exterior Emulsion is an ultra-premium all-weather repellent paint, formulated to deliver superior protection against extreme weather, algae, and fungal growth. It offers a smooth finish with a slight sheen, vibrant color retention, and excellent resistance to peeling, chalking, and fading.

Primer.name: Truebond Exterior Primer
Primer.description: TrueBond Exterior Primer is a high-performance primer designed to prepare and protect exterior surfaces. With excellent coverage, high whiteness, and superior opacity, it reduces surface porosity and enhances paint adhesion, ensuring a longer-lasting topcoat.

Primer.name: Truebond Interior Primer
Primer.description: TrueBond Interior Primer is specially formulated for interior surfaces to improve paint performance. It provides excellent coverage and opacity, enhances whiteness, seals porous substrates effectively, and helps achieve a smooth, even finish.

Primer.name: Ultrabond Exterior Primer
Primer.description: UltraBond Exterior Primer is a premium-quality primer designed for exterior walls. It offers excellent hiding power, enhances surface whiteness, reduces porosity, and provides a strong base for the topcoat to ensure improved durability and finish.

Primer.name: Ultrabond Interior Primer
Primer.description: UltraBond Interior Primer is formulated to offer a perfect base coat for interior walls. It provides excellent coverage, bright whiteness, and strong sealing ability to minimize surface absorption, promoting better adhesion and a superior topcoat finish.

Primer.name: Universal Primer
Primer.description: Universal Primer is a versatile, high-opacity primer suitable for both interior and exterior surfaces. Its advanced formulation offers excellent coverage, superior whiteness, and effective sealing to prepare the surface for a long-lasting and even finish.

Primer.name: Red Oxide Primer
qualities: Suitable for Gates, Railings, and Outdoor Equipment
Primer.description: Red Oxide Primer is a high-performance metal primer formulated to prevent rust formation on ferrous surfaces exposed to air and humidity. Commonly used on gates, railings, and outdoor structures, it creates a strong protective base layer and enhances the adhesion and longevity of topcoats.

RedOxide.name: Red Oxide Primer
qualities: Suitable for Gates, Railings, and Outdoor Equipment
RedOxide.description: Red Oxide Primer is a high-performance metal primer formulated to prevent rust formation on ferrous surfaces exposed to air and humidity. Commonly used on gates, railings, and outdoor structures, it creates a strong protective base layer and enhances the adhesion and longevity of topcoats.

Distemper.name: Tiger Distemper
Distemper.description: Tiger Distemper is a cost-effective interior wall coating designed to deliver bright, vibrant shades with enhanced whiteness. It offers a smooth matt finish that is easy to apply, making it an ideal choice for economical yet aesthetically pleasing wall decoration.

Bullet.name: Bullet Enamel
qualities: Protects Wood and Metal from Corrosion
Bullet.description: Enamel Paint is a high-gloss, tough-finish coating designed to provide lasting beauty and protection. It forms a durable film with a mirror-like gloss that resists harsh weather, fungal growth, and corrosion, making it ideal for safeguarding wood and metal surfaces in both interior and exterior environments.

Industrial.name: Industrial Paint
qualities: Enhances Service Life of Equipment and Infrastructure
Industrial.description: JKP Industrial Paint is a high-performance coating solution developed to protect and enhance the durability of plant machinery and infrastructure. Engineered to meet and exceed international standards, it supports industrial applications through continuous innovation and environmentally conscious practices, delivering long-term reliability and protection.

Marine.name: Marine Paint
qualities: Suitable for Hulls and Underwater Surfaces
Marine.description: JKP Marine Paint is a specialized antifouling coating designed to protect boats and marine vessels from biofouling caused by algae, barnacles, and other organisms. Formulated for long-lasting performance in harsh saltwater environments, it ensures improved efficiency, durability, and maintenance of marine surfaces.

Aluminium.name: Aluminium Paint
qualities: Ideal for Grills, Gates, Roofs, and Pipes
Aluminium.description: Aluminium Paint is a premium protective coating that imparts a bright, metallic luster while safeguarding metal surfaces from corrosion. Its water-resistant formulation makes it ideal for outdoor applications such as metal grills, gates, roofs, and pipes, ensuring both durability and decorative appeal.

Fireproof.name: Fire Guard
qualities: Prevents Fire Spread and Localizes Fire
Suitable for Masonry, Wood, Metal Surfaces
Fireproof.description: Fire Guard is a specialized fire-retarding paint formulated with a non-flammable base and additives that slow down the spread of fire, providing crucial extra time in emergencies. It adheres effectively to masonry, wood, and metal surfaces, and offers resistance against explosions and hose stream impact.

Fireproof.name: Fire Retardant
Fireproof.description: Fire Retarding paint offers advanced protection against fire hazards with its fire-resistant formula. It is engineered to resist explosions, hose stream impacts, and cryogenic immersion, making it suitable for a wide range of industrial and commercial applications requiring high-level fire safety.

Texture.name: Wonder Tex
Texture.description: Wonder Tex is a premium quality acrylic synthetic plaster that combines decoration with long-lasting protection. Formulated with high-performance hydrophobic acrylic polymers, it offers excellent water resistance, strong adhesion, and helps prevent surface cracks. The built-in biocide blend provides outstanding protection against fungal and algal growth.

Texture.name: Volcano Finish
Texture.description: Volcano Finish is a spray texture coating featuring a dynamic bubble-type press pattern with multicolor aesthetics. Made using natural marble powder, it offers both decorative appeal and durable protection. Its antifungal and antibacterial properties make it ideal for long-term surface protection.

Texture.name: Dholpur Stone
Texture.description: Dholpur Stone texture is a synthetic plaster designed to replicate the look of natural stone. Reinforced with marble powder and silica sand, it provides an elegant and durable stone-like finish for both interior and exterior surfaces.

Texture.name: JKP Superfine
Texture.description: JKP Superfine is a new-age textured finish designed for roller application. Reinforced with marble powder, it offers a subtle and refined texture that enhances the visual appeal of modern spaces while providing a durable protective layer.
